title: #148: Flip, Flop, Fuck (@MyqKaplan)
itunes:title: Flip, Flop, Fuck with Myq Kaplan
description: Myq Kaplan came over to my apartment (possibly the last one recorded at my New York apartment in the east Village) to have a talk about monogamy vs polyamory. Myq used to be super into the poly side of it for years but recently has switched over to the dark side. It's a pretty well informed discussion on the subject and somehow we manage to talk a lot about mushrooms, too.
